data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This modules emulates the java datainputstream layer. It's goal is
    to help Java developers working with perl for a smaller learning
    curve. This package emulates most of the methods in
    java.io.InputStream and java.io.DataInputStream

    More packages to come emulating other streams such as a
    FileInputStream and ObjectInputStream
